channel.title: Classes, Factions, Grief, Custom World! IP: 108.217.138.246:25565
channel.description:
pawn and choose a bending power from one of these four elements Its easy:
-Fire -Water -Earth -Air
Or you can choose to become an anti-bending Chi-Blocker! This plugin excels combat and brings PVP to another level of intensity.
The entire world is custom generated biomes turned into mountains! (Though there are a few chunk defects to the south :3) raise the bar on your PVP and go all out in battle to the death with friends or enemies.
We raise a friendly staff that will hear out your problems and will treat everyone equally, the server is not 24/7 or lag free but we're working on that, in fact the entire server is on a beta-test version right now.
The Server IP: 108.217.138.246:25565

item.title: Classes, Factions, Grief, Custom World! IP: 108.217.138.246:25565
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

I’ve merged your two advertisement threads as you may only have one per server. In the future please refer to the board rules before you post, it makes the world a better place

Read full topic
